title: National Timing Resilience and Security Act of 2017
content: National Timing Resilience and Security Act of 2017 This bill requires the Department of Transportation to provide for the establishment, sustainment, and operation of a complement to and backupnbsp, for the timing component of the Global Positioning System (GPS). nbsp, The system must:nbsp, (1) reduce critical dependencies on the GPS network. (2) ensure the availability of uncorrupted and non-degraded timing signals for military and civilian users if GPS timing signals are corrupted or otherwise unavailable, and (3) be land-based, operationalnbsp, in 2 years, and capable of operation for 20 years.
